channel.title: ICEBERG Blog: News, Notes, and Updates
channel.description: Recent content on ICEBERG Blog: News, Notes, and Updates

item.title: New ICEBERG blog
item.description: Welcome to the brand new ICEBERG blog. This is our way of communicating any project news or updates and highlighting new modules as they get tested and made available through git.

item.title: TAC presentation coming up this Thursday
item.description: This Thursday Shantenu and I will be introducing ICEBERG at the TAC Telecon, mor details for joining the call here.
